publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4586 Richard Lochhead: 1986 International Whaling Commission Moratorium on Commercial Whaling—That the Parliament condemns the recent vote by the International Whaling Commission (IWC) in favour of a return to commercial whaling; notes that although the vote will have no practical impact, as it lacks the required majority, it sends out the wrong message; regrets the decision taken by the IWC, and supports the continuation of the 1986 IWC moratorium on commercial whaling.

S2M-4586 1986 International Whaling Commission Moratorium on Commercial Whaling (lodged on 20 June 2006) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Phil Gallie*, Rob Gibson*, Jim Mather*, John Scott*, Mr David Davidson*, Alasdair Morgan*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Mark Ballard*, Michael Matheson*, Robin Harper*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Patrick Harvie*, Eleanor Scott*, Tommy Sheridan*, Fiona Hyslop*, Christine Grahame*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-4586 1986 International Whaling Commission Moratorium on Commercial Whaling (lodged on 20 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Scott Barrie*, Shiona Baird*

S2M-4586 Richard Lochhead: 1986 International Whaling Commission Moratorium on Commercial Whaling—That the Parliament condemns the recent vote by the International Whaling Commission (IWC) in favour of a return to commercial whaling; notes that although the vote will have no practical impact, as it lacks the required majority, it sends out the wrong message; regrets the decision taken by the IWC, and supports the continuation of the 1986 IWC moratorium on commercial whaling. Supported by: Mr Stewart Maxwell, Phil Gallie, Rob Gibson, Jim Mather, John Scott, Mr David Davidson, Alasdair Morgan, Ms Maureen Watt, Mark Ballard, Michael Matheson, Robin Harper, Dr Elaine Murray, Patrick Harvie, Eleanor Scott, Tommy Sheridan, Fiona Hyslop, Christine Grahame, Chris Ballance, Donald Gorrie, Scott Barrie, Shiona Baird
S2M-4586 1986 International Whaling Commission Moratorium on Commercial Whaling (lodged on 20 June 2006) Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-4586 1986 International Whaling Commission Moratorium on Commercial Whaling (lodged on 20 June 2006) Linda Fabiani*
